article: I went to a local post office to send a gift to Florida yesterday afternoon. When I walked through the door, there were many people waiting there. A bit _ , I decided to calmly wait for my turn to place the precious package on the _ . Since I didn't _ the tape to seal the box, I went to buy the tape. As I _ secure the top of the box, a woman in front of me, a similar situation, asked if she could use some _ . I gave her some and helped her put the gift into her _ . Then a woman behind me also asked me if she could have some tape, since her envelop had ripped and I gladly _ it to her. When the woman in front of me _ who I was sending the package to, I explained that my 80-year-old _ Selma lives in Florida, 1200 miles from my home. She has a(n) _ neighbor named Diane who has, on several occasions, accompanied her to the hospital. My mom _ her "her angel" and had asked me to send her two willow tree angel. As we spoke, the line moved and she offered me a place in front of her. I was _ and thanked her. At that moment, the other people in front of her ushered me in front of them by the time I _ the counter, we were all smiling and laughing and I thanked them sincerely. A few inches of tape can seal the world _ .
